description.Fast Food: Resurrected targets gain increased movement speed for x seconds after being resurrected.
description.Self Service: Snack Attack also heals Doug by x% of the normal value.
description.Comboshrooms: Hitting the second mushroom to the same target as the first, deals x% extra damage.
description.Mushroom Kingdom: Cordelius spawns x mushrooms to the Shadow Realm after using his super, healing allies and damaging enemies for x health on pickup.
description.Its Gonna Blow: When Balloon Blast is charged over x%, Hank gains x% extra movement speed.
description.Take Cover: Hank takes x% less damage when near a wall.
description.Pinpoint Precision: Pressure rocket deals x% more damage at max distance.
description.Tremors: Enemies hit by Shockwave are also slowed down for x seconds.
description.Love Is Blind: Lantern's Curse also reduces reload speed of affected brawlers by x%
description.Obsession: Hexed enemies gain x% movement speed while mind controlled.
description.Quick Maths: Marks created last x seconds longer.
description.Recording: R-T and his legs take x% less damage when split.
description.In My Sights: Mandy shoots her candies with x% more speed while Focused.
description.Hard Candy: Mandy receives x% shield while Focused.
description.Fake Injury: When Gray has full health, the next damage taken is reduced by <VALUE>%.
description.New Perspective: When Gray or his Allies use Doors, they recover <VALUE> hit points.
description.Bellomania: Chester's attack has an extra stage with four bells.
description.Sneak Peek: Chester will always know what his next Super will be.
description.Blockbuster: Buster's Lens Flare deals x% more damage for each ally in his Super's charge area.
description.Kevlar Vest: While Montage is active Buster takes x% less damage and is immune to knockbacks, slows and stuns.
description.Health Bonanza: Healing gained from spirits are increased by x%.
description.Spirit Animal: Spooky increases the damage of a teammate by x% for x seconds.
description.Hearty Recovery: Upon recalling his Knuckle Busters, Sam instantly recovers x% of his missing health.
description.Remote Recharge: While the Knuckle Busters are on the ground and near enemies, they will charge up Sam's Super.
description.Stencil Glue: Cil mightily squeezes the enemy with all his might. Preventing them from attacking for x% longer.
description.Ink Refills: Otis now shoots x% more ink drops.
description.Black Powder: The range of Bonnie's Star Launcher is increased by x%.
description.Wisdom Tooth: Loose Tooth shatters on hit, dealing x% extra damage to nearby enemies.
description.Stage View: While in the air with her jetpack, Janet reveals a large area of bushes around herself.
description.Unnatural Order: Reverses the order of the eggs shot by her Egg Shooter.
description.Happy Surprise: Every x seconds, the next largest egg hitting an enemy of her Egg Shooter will spawn a hatchling.
description.Fresh Kicks: When Fang defeats an enemy Brawler with his Super, it's recharged instantly, allowing him to use his Super again!
description.Divine Soles: Reduce x damage from incoming hits once every x seconds. Maximum reduction is x% of the incoming damage.
description.Improvise: When down to her last round, Lola deals an extra x% damage.
description.Sealed With A Kiss: Projectiles from Lola's Ego will heal allies that are caught in its path by x health.
description.Force Field: Meg is protected by a x% shield for x seconds when her Mecha is destroyed.
description.Heavy Metal: Upon expiring, the Mecha suit explodes, dealing x damage to nearby opponents and pushing them away.
description.First Bash: When hitting an opponent with his attack charges full, Ash gets even more angry. His Rage goes up by x%.
description.Mad As Heck: Ash progressively gains up to x% faster reload speed, equal to how enraged he's become.
description.Keep The Change: Furious Griff tosses coins faster, reducing the time for a full salvo by x%.
description.Business Resilience: Every x seconds, Griff regains up to x% of his missing health.
description.Tougher Torpedo: The minimum duration of Buzz's Super stun is increased by x seconds.
description.Eyes Sharp: Buzz's Super charging area is increased by x%.
description.Foot Patrol: When Grom's Super is fully charged, he gains +x% faster movement speed!
description.X-Factor: The split from Grom's main attack deals up to +x% extra damage at max distance.
description.Chain Reaction: Each opponent within the area of a Sticky Blomb's explosion increases the Blomb's damage by x%.
description.Super Sticky: Secondary Sticky Blomb explosions from Squeak's Super also slow down opponents for x seconds.
description.Positive Feedback: Belle gains a x% shield whenever her Electro-Bolts hit a target.
description.Grounded: Getting marked by Belle's Super prevents the opponent from reloading their attack for x seconds.
description.Zero Drag: Stu's Nitro Boost Super dash distance increases by x%.
description.Gaso-Heal: Using his Nitro Boost Super restores x of Stu's health.
description.Air Superiority: Supply Drop now includes a bomb that adds +x damage to the drop and also allows it to destroy walls.
description.Field Promotion: Friendly Brawlers have their maximum health increased by x every second that they are in range of this ability while it's active.
description.Hard Landing: Edgar's Super will also deal x damage to nearby enemies upon landing.
description.Fisticuffs: Edgar receives x% more healing from damage he deals.
description.Malaise: Byron's Super will also cause opponents to receive x% less healing from any source for x seconds.
description.Injection: Every x seconds the next basic attack will pierce through targets.
description.Supercool: Opponents standing on Lou's Super area get frozen x% faster.
description.Hypothermia: Opponents lose up to x% of their damage based on how frozen they are from Lou's attacks.
description.Wild Flames: Amber can have two fuel puddles on the ground simultaneously and she will recharge her Super automatically when standing near one.
description.Scorchin Siphon: While being near a puddle of fire fluid, Amber uses it to reload her firebreathing x% faster.
description.Push It: All enemy Brawlers hit by Colette's charge are carried to the farthest point of the attack!
description.Mass Tax: Colette's super gives her a x% shield for x seconds. Every enemy Brawler hit by it will add x% more protection.
description.To The Max: Surge's main attack now splits when hitting walls.
description.Serve Ice Cold: Surge keeps his STAGE 1 Super upgrade for the full match duration.
description.Overgrowth: Every x seconds, the next Seed Bomb will explode with a larger explosion radius.
description.Photosynthesis: Sprout activates a shield, partially protecting itself from all attacks while inside a bush.
description.Autofocus: Peep deals up to x extra damage based on his travel distance.
description.Tempered Steel: Nani takes x% less damage while her Super is active.
description.Blustery Blow: Gale's Super now stuns enemies for x seconds if they are pushed against obstacles.
description.Freezing Snow: Gale's snow balls now also slow down opponents for x seconds.
description.Counter Crush: When receiving damage, Jacky returns the favor by converting x% of the damage into a Groundbreaker counterattack.
description.Hardy Hard Hat: Jacky's Hard Hat protects her by reducing any damage she takes by x%.
description.Super Charged: Max now charges her Super while moving.
description.Handle With Care: Every x seconds, the explosion damage of Mr. P's next overstuffed suitcase is increased by x%.
description.Revolving Door: All robo-porters from the home base now have x% more health and x% higher damage.
description.Bad Karma: Enemies that stay within the cloud of Emz's toxic hair spray suffer increasing damage, x% per hit.
description.Hype: Emz recovers x health per second for each enemy Brawler inside her Super's area of effect.
description.Insta Beaload: Instantly supercharge Bea's Big Sting one time if she misses a supercharged shot.
description.Honeycomb: Bea receives a x% shield while Big Sting is supercharged.
description.Rude Sands: Sandstorm now also damages enemies for x damage per second.
description.Healing Winds: Sandstorm now also heals friendly Brawlers for x health per second.
description.Boosted Booster: Increases the Damage Booster's range by x% and boosts damage by an additional x%.
description.Plugged In: When 8-Bit is near his Damage Booster, he will plug in and have increased movement speed.
description.Home Run: Bibi's movement speed is increased by x% when her Home Run bar is fully charged.
description.Batting Stance: When Bibi's Homerun bar is fully charged, she shields herself from all damage by x%.
description.Power Throw: Carl throws his Pickaxe with x% more speed, allowing it to travel and return faster.
description.Protective Pirouette: During Carl's Super, all damage he receives is reduced by x%.
description.Plant Life: Rosa recovers x health per second when inside a bush.
description.Thorny Gloves: Rosa's punches gain +x damage during her Super.
description.Smoke Trails: When Leon uses his Super, he gains a x% boost to his movement speed for the duration of his invisibility.
description.Invisiheal: Leon recovers x health per second while his Super is active.
description.Well Oiled: When Tick takes no damage and doesn't attack, he starts recovering health x seconds faster than normal.
description.Automa-Tick Reload: Tick's reload time is x% shorter.
description.Magic Puffs: Gene heals all friendly Brawlers around him for x health per second.
description.Spirit Slap: Gene's Magic Hand also damages enemies, dealing x damage on hit.
description.Power Grab: Frank steals the power of a Brawler he defeats, increasing his damage by x% for x seconds!
description.Heavy Coffers: Penny's gold pouches burst with a x% wider cone after each hit.
description.Master Blaster: Penny's cannon deals x damage and knocks back nearby enemies on landing.
description.Steel Hoops: After Barrel Roll all damage Darryl takes is reduced by x% for x seconds.
description.Rolling Reload: When Darryl uses his Super, he doubles his reload speed for x seconds.
description.Black Portal: Tara's Super cracks open a dimensional portal! A shadowy version of Tara appears and attacks her enemies.
description.Healing Shade: Tara's Super cracks open a dimensional portal! A shadowy version of Tara appears to heal Tara and her teammates.
description.Mamas Hug: Whenever Pam hits enemy Brawlers with Scrapstorm, she heals herself and nearby friendly Brawlers for x health.
description.Mamas Squeeze: Healing turret now also damages enemies for x damage per second.
description.Ambush: Piper's attack deals +x extra damage (at max range) when she's hidden in a bush.
description.Snappy Sniping: When Piper hits an opponent with her attack, she reloads x ammo instantly.
description.Circling Eagle: Bo spots enemies hidden in bushes from x% longer distance than normally.
description.Snare A Bear: Instead of a knockback, Bo's traps now stun the enemy for x seconds!
description.Da Capo: When Poco's attack hits friendly Brawlers they now heal for x health.
description.Screeching Solo: Poco's Super now also hits enemies, dealing x damage.
description.Extra Toxic: Crow's poison saps the strength of enemies, who deal x% less damage while poisoned.
description.Carrion Crow: Crow deals +x damage with his attack and Super to targets with x% or less health.
description.Creepy Harvest: Mortis reaps the life essence of Brawler he defeats, restoring x of his health.
description.Coiled Snake: Mortis gains his longer dash x seconds faster.
description.El Fuego: Enemies caught in El Primo's Super will burn for x damage over 4 seconds.
description.Meteor Rush: El Primo gains a x% speed boost for x seconds after using his Super.
description.Dyna-Jump: Dynamike can ride the blast wave of his explosives to jump over obstacles!
description.Bear With Me: Nita recovers x health whenever her bear hits an enemy Brawler. When Nita deals damage to an enemy Brawler, her bear regains x health.
description.Hyper Bear: Nita's bear attacks faster. Time between swipes is reduced by x%.
description.Energize: Jessie can repair her gun turret for x of its missing health by zapping it with her attack.
description.Shocky: Scrappy the Turret now shoots energy orbs that bounce between enemies. The orbs' range after a bounce is x% of normal range.
description.Medical Use: Barley regains x health from each attack.
description.Extra Noxious: Adds +x damage per second to Barley's attack.
description.Fertilize: After using Super, Spike regenerates x health per second by staying in its area of effect.
description.Curveball: Spikes from the cactus grenade fly in a curving motion, making it easier to hit targets.
description.Super Bouncy: Rico's bullets, from attack and Super alike, get supercharged by their first bounce and deal +x damage!
description.Robo Retreat: When Rico falls below x% health, he runs x% faster!
description.More Rockets: Rocket Rain now rains down x% more rockets.
description.Rocket No. 4: Brock loads a fourth rocket into his launcher, increasing his ammo capacity (and discarding the thermos bottle he's been keeping in his launcher's fourth tube).
description.Berserker: When Bull falls below x% health, his reload speed doubles!
description.Tough Guy: When Bull falls below x% health, he gains a shield that reduces all damage he takes by x%.
description.Slick Boots: Colt's movement speed is increased by x%.
description.Magnum Special: Colt's attack range and bullet speed are increased by x%.
description.Shell Shock: Shelly's Super shells slow down enemies for x seconds!
description.Band-Aid: When Shelly falls below x% health, she instantly heals for x health. Band-Aid recharges in x seconds.
